title: MainStage 3.1.1 zip
description:
MainStage 3 lets you take your Mac to the stage with a full-screen interface optimized for live performance, flexible hardware control, and a massive collection of plug-ins and sounds that are fully compatible with Logic Pro X.

The Ultimate Live Rig
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perform live with more than 80 instrument, effect, and MIDI plug-ins or work with Audio Units plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add your sounds from Logic Pro X and GarageBand to bring your studio sound to the stage
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Combine instruments and live audio, such as keyboards and vocals, in a single Patch
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Switch between Patches without stopping sound output or cutting off held notes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Design rich keyboard Patches using splits and layers, the Arpeggiator, and other MIDI plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perform with stereo or multitrack backing tracks using Playback
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 64-bit architecture uses all the RAM in your system for larger sampled instruments 

Hardware Control
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Connect your favorite hardware and use it to play and control your plug-ins 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use USB and MIDI-equipped controllers like keyboards, foot pedals, and drum pads
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly set up a large variety of hardware using automatic device recognition
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly assign hardware knobs, buttons, and faders to onscreen controls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manage sophisticated rigs using the Assignments & Mapping overview

Designed for the Stage
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ See only what you need during your performance using a customizable, full-screen live interface
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Screen controls adapt for each Patch using Smart Controls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Smart Controls offer dynamic performance controls that change with each Patch
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily view your Mac screen from a distance using a high-contrast, full-screen performance view

Instrument Plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play deeply sampled, professionally mixed, and fully customizable drum kits provided by Drum Kit Designer
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perform electronic beats with the Ultrabeat drum machine
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play classic Ã¢â‚¬â„¢70s- and Ã¢â‚¬â„¢80s-style synthesizer sounds using Retro Synth
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play faithful models of vintage keyboards with Vintage B3, Vintage Electric Piano, and Vintage Clav
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perform inspired sounds using a collection of synths that provide analog, wavetable, FM, and physical modeling synthesis
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play or create a wide variety of rich sampled instruments with the EXS24 Sampler
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Turn your favorite hardware synthesizers into sampled instruments using new Auto Sampler plug-in 

MIDI Plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Transform simple ideas into elaborate performances using nine MIDI plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly turn a simple chord into a rich performance with the Arpeggiator
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play a single note to trigger predefined chords with Chord Trigger
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perform a part and conform notes to a specific scale using Transposer

Creative and Production Effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play your sounds through realistic acoustic spaces using Space Designer convolution reverb
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use a range of multi-tap, vintage tape, and stereo delays
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add movement to your tracks with a variety of modulation effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Get the perfect mix with a collection of EQs, dynamics, and other mixing tools

Guitar and Bass Gear
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Build your own guitar or bass rig with Amp Designer using vintage and modern amps, cabinets, and mics
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Design a custom Pedalboard from a collection of delay, distortion, and modulation stompboxes 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Access a full-screen Tuner to quickly get in tune

Sound Library
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 1800 instrument and effect Patches
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ More than 750 meticulously sampled instruments
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 3600 Apple Loops in modern urban and electronic genres

Minimum System Requirements
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 4GB RAM
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Display with 1280-by-768 resolution or higher
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ OS X v10.9.5 or later
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Requires 64-bit Audio Units plug-ins
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 6GB available disk space for minimum install / 35GB hard disk for full Sound Library installation
